subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: ¶Steven Gerrard scored twice for host Liverpool in a 4-0 rout of Real Madrid, winning the home-and-home, total-goal series, 5-0, and advancing to the quarterfinals of the UEFA Champions League. Chelsea, Bayern Munich and Villareal also advanced. uefa.
